About Me

Hello! My name is Tetsuo and I'm a 2nd year Computer Science student at UNSW. My hobbies right now are programming (in Rust or Python, I kinda hate Javascript after making this website), running, reading fiction books and watching Netflix. I'm also learning how to play the guitar and how to do security research.

This is my first time making a website with actual JavaScript. My HTML and CSS skills are super rusty so please forgive the messy look.

Other things about me:

  • I have a twin.
  • I'm half Japanese, half Thai.
  • I want to switch to Linux but I'm too scared to do it.

Projects

Github

kase64

An encryption algorithm which combines RC4's key scheduling algorithm with Base64 encoding. COMP3331 gave me the inspiration to write this algorithm.

shooter-rs

A 2-player FPS game written in Rust using Raylib library.
